ygData.subject: travels behind the scenes and the infamous 'cat room' OT
ygData.msgSnippet: Didn t someone on this list fall victim to the infamous wcommons/befallen cat room bug?  I was wondering how one could get into that room.  I have seen
ygData.messageBody:
Didn't someone on this list fall victim to the infamous wcommons/befallen
'cat room' bug? I was wondering how one could get into that room. I have
seen screenshots of it, and of Befallen using the Eye of Zomm, but I don't
recall anyone saying how they got stuck in there. The screenshot I remember
most was the one showing several npc shopkeeper's caught in the room as well
along with several other creatures including a young kodiak. Anyone have
any more info on this?

Kitasi the inquiring on E'ci
